H3.text: what territory is spain and the united kingdom in a dispute over. Gibraltar

A4.text: The sovereignty of Gibraltar is a point of contention in Anglo-Spanish relations as Spain asserts a claim to the territory.

A5.text: the government of Gibraltar organised a referendum on the plan, and 99% of the population voted to reject it.
